title: Malcolm Douglas - Australia [DUAL.Eng-Deu] The Last Of A Tribe
description:
Malcolm Douglas - The Last of a Tribe (1976 - Australia)

Adventure / Travel / Documentary
 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malcolm_Douglas_(documentary_maker)


Malcolm lives with the tribal elders of the Worora and Narinjin tribes at their bush camp in the remote Kimberley. Daily he films activities; collecting food, hunting and ceremonial life. An important film showing a culture rapidly changing.

Malcolm Douglas (1941-2010) produced over 50 travel and adventure films for Australian television during the last 40 years. When Malcolm Douglas immersed himself within an Indigenous cultural landscape, he took lounge rooms full of Australian viewers with him.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 704x528, 25.000 fps, 1400 Kbps, 00h48m24s
Audio: AAC, 48000 Hz, stereo
Audio: AAC, 48000 Hz, stereo

DVDRip, DUAL Audio Tracks English and German, no subtitles
